Monday:
custom: Lift Weights
- warmup: 10:00
- go: 60:00 @z2; Deadlifts, Benchpress
- cooldown: 10:00
Tuesday:
running: 12 @ 400m with 400m rest
- warmup: 1mi
- repeat: 12; Speed intervals
  - run: 400m @ 6:50-7:00mpm
  - recover: 400m
- cooldown: 1mi
Wednesday:
swimming: 1000 yards
- warmup: 100yds
- swim: 1000yds Any Stroke Fins
- cooldown: 100yds
Friday:
swimming: Casual swim
- swim: 45:00; Easy swim for resting
Saturday:
cycling: 30 Mile Ride
- warmup: 10:00
- bike: 30mi @z2
- cooldown: lap-button
Sunday:
running: 2x4x2'@z5
- warmup: 20:00
- repeat: 2
  - repeat: 4
    - run: 1:00 @z5
    - recover: 2:00 @z2
  - recover: 4:00
- cooldown: 10:00
